Updates to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
 
Zynga’s mission is to connect the world through games, by delivering fun, social entertainment experiences to people around the world.
{nl}
{nl}
{nl}
 
{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}
{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}
{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}
Privacy Policy
 
Our Privacy Policy has been updated to make it more player-friendly and to reflect the evolution of our games, features and services. These updates reinforce our ongoing commitment to being transparent about our use of your information and respecting your privacy. Here are some highlights:
{nl}
    {nl}
  • We launched a new self-service Personal Data Request website to make it easier for you to request to download or delete your game account information.
    • {nl}
  • We added information required by Europe’s new data protection law called the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
    • {nl}
  • We added some detail about the types of information we collect, how we use that information, and how you can exercise your privacy rights.
    • {nl}
  • We added short summaries of each section of the Policy to make it easier to understand.
    • {nl}
{nl}
{nl}
{nl}
{nl}
{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}
{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}
{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}
Terms of Service
 
We also updated our Terms of Service, including adding a hyperlinked Table of Contents for easier navigation and adding further detail to the arbitration provisions (for our U.S. and Canadian players).
{nl}
{nl}
{nl}
 
{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}
{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}
{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}{nl}{nl} {nl}
Please read our updated Privacy Policy and Terms of Service in full, as they are important legal documents and this email does not summarize every change. If you have any questions, please contact us through Customer Support.
{nl}
{nl}
{nl}
 
{nl} {nl} {nl} {nl} {nl}

Thank you for playing and being a part of the Zynga gaming community!
 
The Zynga Team
